text: Nɨbi bɨ Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgtep gep okok sek, bɨ Pelisi okok sek tɨtay dɨnɨgabɨm agak. Nɨbi bɨ yepɨs yɨbɨl gep agak. Nɨbi binɨb okok kɨlop takaw agñon chɨnop ak nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨlaŋ agɨl, ñɨg solwala okok sek man okok sek mɨdupsek pɨyow ajɨpɨm agak. Ajɨl, olap nɨŋɨd nop agñem nɨbop nɨŋɨd dup agak. Nɨbop nɨŋɨd dup ak, nɨbi mab ke yɨneb ak amnɨgabɨm tek ne abe amnɨgab agak. Pen nɨbi tek mel, bɨ tɨmel awl yɨbɨl yenɨgab agak.
